DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Brushes - Medium Filbert
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Medium Filbert Face Painting Brush #BRUFILM is 0.35 inches wide and serves to add special designs. Snazaroo Brushes have nickel plated ferrules, a 7 5/8 in yellow handle, and high-quality nylon synthetic bristles. Snazaroo synthetic brushes offer value, durability, and are easy to clean. The Snazaroo Medium Filbert Brush works well for creating small butterfly wings.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red medium filbert face painting brush
Features high-quality synthetic bristles, nickel plated ferrules with a 7 5/8" yellow handle

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Brushes - Large Filbert
DescriptionData.Description: Rounded tip, .75" long, .45" at widest point. Total overall length about 7-3/4 inches. Ruby Red provides a great line of professional quality brushes. All are designed specifically for use with face painting. The bristles are the best quality synthetic bristle. They pick up the product well, have the perfect amount of stiffness for application, they are durable and wash easily. You will wonder how you ever face painted without them.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red large filbert sable face painting brush

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Brushes - Super Flat
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Super Flat Face Painting Brush #BRUFSUPER is 1 3/8 inch long and 1 1/8 inch wide, making it the ideal rainbow cake brush and also great for applying face paint to large areas of the skin in broad even brush strokes. Snazaroo Brushes have nickel plated ferrules, a 6 5/8 in black handle, and high-quality nylon synthetic bristles. Snazaroo synthetic brushes offer value, durability, and are easy to clean. The Snazaroo Super Flat Brush is great for using rainbow cakes or creating a base for your face painting designs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red super flat face painting brush
Features high-quality synthetic bristles, nickel plated ferrules with a 6 5/8" black handle

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Brushes - Fan
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Fan Face Painting Brush #BRUFAN is 1. 45 inches wide and is used to brush away extra glitter and makeup powder. Snazaroo Brushes have nickel plated ferrules, a 7 in yellow handle, and high-quality nylon synthetic bristles. Snazaroo synthetic brushes offer value, durability, and are easy to clean. The Snazaroo Fan Brush is also perfect for making butterfly wings on the cheek.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red fan face painting brush
Features high-quality synthetic bristles, nickel plated ferrules with a 7" yellow handle

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Dotter Wand
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Dotter Wants are the ideal tool to add dots to your face painting design. Load the face paint on the foam tip and touch it to the skin for a nice round 1/16th of an inch dot. Push the Snazaroo dotter wand harder to create a dot up to a 1/4 inch.

DescriptionData.Title: Aqualon Brushes - #1 Round
DescriptionData.Description: Aqualon Round #1 Face Painting Brush #R2250-1 works well for very small details. A Royal Aqualon brush is made of synthetic filament, nickel-plated brass ferrule, and a clear acrylic handle. Aqualon brushes are admired for their fine points, sharp edges, outstanding spring and exceptional durability. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Aqualon Round #1 Brush is perfect for creating fine details like spider's legs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Aqualon small round face painting brush
Features synthetic filament bristles, nickel plated ferrules, and a clear acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Mixing Liquid (4.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Mixing Liquid can be used as a thinner for Liquid Makeup or to create an intense, opaque liquid metal makeup with Metallic Powders or Gem Powders. Mixing Liquid contains a fixative for highly durable, water-resistant application that will wash off with soap and water. Mehron Mixing Liquid enables you to make unique liquid makeup for special projects in body painting and face painting. 4.5 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Use about twice as much Mixing Liquid as powder, depending on the effect you want Each 4.5 ounce bottle can do hundreds of small applications or up to 1/2 a body

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Magic Set (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Magic Set Mixing liquid is used to create colors of liquid makeup out of metallic powders or glitter powder. Graftobian Magic Set is a clear, reasonably quick drying liquid which, when added to a metallic powder, yields brush-on glitter that can be used for body art or to create durable and beautiful accents. Graftobian Magic Set is different from other mixing liquids because their formula has no alcohol in it, so it is safe for use around the eyes.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mixed with powdered metal, each 2 ounce Graftobian Magic Set bottle will apply to about 100 eyes and up to 1/2 a full body

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;

DescriptionData.Title: Soft Grip Brushes - 1/2" Filbert Comb
DescriptionData.Description: Soft Grip 1/2 in Filbert Comb Face Painting Brush #SG930 serves as a good medium brush for blending and shading. Soft Grip brushes are made of Golden Taklon fibers, silver-colored aluminum ferrule, and a blue tipped acrylic handle. Each Soft Grip has a patented Soft-Grip for extra comfort while face painting. The Soft Grip 1/2 in Filbert Comb Brush is ideal for spectacular eye effects.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made of golden Taklon fibers with a silver-colored aluminum ferrule, and a blue tipped acrylic handle

Aqualon brushes are admired for their fine points, sharp edges, outstanding spring and exceptional durability

Royal Majestic brushes are made of synthetic filament, black anodized brass ferrule, and a Silk Touch kiln-dried hardwood handle. Majestic brushes are admired for their capacity for holding face paint, weightless feel, durability and snap. The Majestic 1/2 in Angular Brush is ideal for creating the stripes on a tiger.

DescriptionData.Description: Aqualon 1/2 in Filbert Wisp Face Painting Brush #R2925 is an uneven brush, perfect for creating fur effects. Aqualon Wisp brushes are made of synthetic filament, nickel plated brass ferrule, and a clear acrylic handle. The Aqualon 1/2 in Filbert Wisp Brush is ideal for adding fur to lions and bears.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Aqualon filbert wisp face painting brush
Features synthetic filament bristles, nickel plated ferrules, and a clear acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Skin Prep Pro (No Sweat)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron ProFace Skin Prep Pro (previously No Sweat) is a fragrance free, clear liquid skin prep formula with antiperspirant properties A superb product designed to impede sweating under any kind of makeup application; including airbrush, thick character/clown makeup, fx makeup design and Halloween makeup. Mehron Skin Prep Pro is perfect for use in warmer weather or for performing with high activity outdoors such as clowns and stage performers under the lights. 4 ounce bottle
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mehron ProFace Skin Prep Pro (previously No Sweat)
Clear liquid skin prep formula with antiperspirant properties
Impedes sweating under any kind of makeup application

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Liquid Brush Cleaner (4.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron StageLine Brush Treatment keeps your brushes clean, deodorized and sanitized. When you're out face painting, StageLine Brush Treatment is a quick and easy way to clean your face painting brushes between uses. 4.5 oz/133 ml.
Please note that this item is flammable and cannot be shipped via Air or International shipping.

DescriptionData.Title: White Taklon Brushes - #5 Round
DescriptionData.Description: White Taklon #5 Round Face Painting Brush #R259-5 serves as a good round brush for blending face paint. White Taklon brushes are made of synthetic filament, nickel-plated brass ferrule, and kiln-dried hardwood handle. A White Taklon brush is renown for being durable and resistant to abuse. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The White Taklon #5 Round Brush is ideal for blending different colors on and over the eyes.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Brushes are made of a synthetic filament with a nickel-plated ferrule and a kiln-dried hardwood handle

DescriptionData.Title: White Taklon Brushes - #2 Round
DescriptionData.Description: White Taklon #2 Round Face Painting Brush #R259-2 serves as a good small brush for creating details. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The White Taklon #2 Round Brush is ideal for adding jewels to a Mardi Gras mask.

DescriptionData.Title: Soft Grip Brushes - #6 Round Short Hair
DescriptionData.Description: Soft Grip #6 Round Short Hair Face Painting Brush #SG255-6 serves as a good round brush for creating details. Soft Grip brushes are made of Golden Taklon fibers, silver-colored aluminum ferrule, and a blue tipped acrylic handle. Each Soft Grip has a patented Soft-Grip for extra comfort while face painting. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Soft Grip #6 Round Short Hair Brush is ideal for spots on a leopard.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Soft Grip round short haired brush
Made of golden Taklon fibers with a silver-colored aluminum ferrule, and a blue tipped acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: Popcorn Dye Magic Box
DescriptionData.Description: This great utility item has so many uses. A cardboard popcorn box is shown empty. Suddenly, silks are magically produced from it! It can also be used to vanish silks or make them change color. Other small items can also be used in the box. The perfect vanish for (20th Century Silks).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic item disappearing and re-appearing popcorn box

DescriptionData.Title: Tootsie Pops
DescriptionData.Description: One at a time, four Tootsie Roll pops are pulled from a bag, showing four different flavors. Pick two flavors for yourself to keep and hand the bag with the remaining two to a spectator. But then? They have disappeared! Magically they are in the other bag along with your pops! Now all four are handed out for audience to enjoy! Such a massive upgrade from the old flat plastic lollipop trick! An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes a bag and four Tootsie Roll pops

DescriptionData.Title: Santa in the Chimney Silk Routine
DescriptionData.Description: This occupies no space but works great! Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk. Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks. The Santa vanishes into the chimney but where? Maybe he got stuck! Magically, you pull him out but he's covered in soot! And where are the gifts? They're in the bag that you showed empty before you started. This can be done your way, using thumbtips, change bag, etc. An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks.
It occupies no space but plays great!
Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk.

DescriptionData.Title: Vanishing Cane Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: You twirl a cane between your fingers and even tap it on the floor to prove it's solid. While you hold the cane on each end, it instantaneously changes into two large silks (not included) or vanishes altogether! You will also need two (18 inch silks) or 24 inch silks to perform this effect.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - 1/4" Flat
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Flat #4 Face Painting Brush #78052 is great for broad brushstrokes. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. The number of the face painting brush, follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Graftobian Flat #4 Brush is 3/16 of an inch wide and is perfect for blending face paint.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - 3/8" Flat
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Flat #10 Face Painting Brush #78053 is great for blending and applying large areas with face paint in flat strokes. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. The Graftobian Flat #10 Brush is 3/8 of an inch wide and is great for loading a large amount of face paints.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - 1 Inch Flat
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian's fabulous Ruby Brush Series sport Golden Taklon fibre, long known for its durability, resilience and quality. 1 inch wide brush is excellent for wide coverage areas.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - Fine Point
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Fine Detail 5/0 Face Painting Brush #94051 is great for creating smaller details and highlighting. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. Graftobian Fine Detail 5/0 Makeup Brush is perfect for adding the details to set your face painting apart.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - Filbert #10
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Filbert #10 Face Painting Brush #78083, sometimes called a chisel brush, is great for loading a lot of face paint and filling in eyelids and large areas of the face and body with broad, round strokes. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. Graftobian Filbert #10 Makeup Brush is also perfect for making petal shapes.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - Small Fan
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Small Fan #2 Face Painting Brush #78076, is used to brush away extra glitter and makeup powder. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. Graftobian Small Fan #2 Makeup Brush is also perfect for making butterfly wings on the cheek.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - 1/2" Angle
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Angle Face Painting Brush #78079, is equally useful in covering a broad area in face paint as well as detail work. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. The Graftobian Angle Brush is 1/2 of an inch wide and is great for covering the eye lids and eye brows.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - 1/4" Angle
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Angle Face Painting Brush #78077, is good at creating sharp, precise lines. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. The Graftobian Angle Brush is 1/4 of an inch wide and is great for eye shadow, eye liner, and brow and lip coloring.

DescriptionData.Title: BeautySoClean Conditioning Brush Cleanser, 8.5 oz (250ml)
DescriptionData.Description:
BeautySoClean Brush Cleanser is specially designed with natural ingredients making it perfectly safe to use. Effectively cleans and sanitizes your face paint brushes. Works well for synthetic and natural bristles. Specially designed to dry fast. Leaves no residue on the brushes, face or makeup product.
Recommended for use in group painting events such as schools and other community events to prevent germs and infections from spreading from one face to another. All BeautySoClean products are Dermatology tested and non-irritating. 100% effective in 10 seconds. Comes in 8.5 ounce (250ml) bottle.

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Gecko Sponge Brush Holders, Green
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Green Gecko Brush Holders are light weight, easy to clean, and a fun way to hold your face painting brushes. Snazaroo Gecko Brush Holders are about 9 inches long, 2 1/4 inches deep and die cut from strong foam. Face painting brushes can be stored in the gecko's back, tail and eyes. You can put smaller face painting brushes even in the gecko brush holder's toes! A Snazaroo Green Gecko Brush Holder is a must have to add fun to your face painting. Brushes not included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red green gecko sponge brush holder

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Gecko Brush Holders - Purple
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Purple Gecko Brush Holders are light weight, easy to clean, and a fun way to hold your face painting brushes. Snazaroo Gecko Brush Holders are about 9 inches long, 2 1/4 inches deep and die cut from strong foam. Face painting brushes can be stored in the gecko's back, tail and eyes. You can put smaller face painting brushes even in the gecko brush holder's toes! A Snazaroo Purple Gecko Brush Holder is a must have to add fun to your face painting. Brushes not included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red purple gecko sponge brush holder

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Gecko Brush Holders - Red
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Red Gecko Brush Holders are light weight, easy to clean, and a fun way to hold your face painting brushes. Snazaroo Gecko Brush Holders are about 9 inches long, 2 1/4 inches deep and die cut from strong foam. Face painting brushes can be stored in the gecko's back, tail and eyes. You can put smaller face painting brushes even in the gecko brush holder's toes! A Snazaroo Red Gecko Brush Holder is a must have to add fun to your face painting. Brushes not included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red red gecko sponge brush holder

DescriptionData.Title: Proface Grease Makeup Remover (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: ProFace Makeup Remover is an oil less base makeup remover which contains moisturizers and skin care products. It is specially designed to quickly and gently remove highly pigmented cream/grease makeup. The remover will not affect the eyes or contact lenses, and has a light apricot fragrance. 2 oz Bottle
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Quickly removes highly pigmented cream/grease makeup

DescriptionData.Title: Proface Makeup Remover (8 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: ProFace Makeup Remover is an oil less base makeup remover which contains moisturizers and skin care products. It is specially designed to quickly and gently remove highly pigmented cream/grease makeup. The remover will not affect the eyes or contact lenses, and has a light apricot fragrance. 8oz bottle
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Quickly removes highly pigmented cream/grease makeup

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Makeup Remover Lotion (4.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: A liquid makeup that helps break down creme makeup quickly and gently, leaving your skin soft! 4.5 oz. size.

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Designed specially to work with all ProKnows noses and tips. 1 oz. size. Clean your nose or remove build-up of adhesive in your clown nose with ProKnows Dissolvent.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Designed to work with all ProKnows noses and tips
Item can't be shipped in the winter months

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Adhesives Dots
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's double-faced medical grade adhesive tape in round dots is a welcome alternative to messy glues. Their double-faced adhesive tape will keep every clown's nose in place. It goes on easy and comes off clean. 36 dots per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: double-faced medical-grade adhesive tape in round dots
Goes on easy, comes off clean

DescriptionData.Title: Proface Barrier Cream (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Protects sensitive skin from staining by makeup pigments, latex and other adhesives. It is also a good protective barrier for those with chemical sensitivities. Apply to clean skin before applying makeup to prevent sweat from coming through the makeup. 2 oz. size
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Protects sensitive skin from makeup, latex, pigment stains, and adhesives

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Flesh (Lt Tan) Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Cinema Secrets Flesh Latex is a natural rubber adhesive that has a tint of flesh tone, making it great for blending the edges of bald caps and other latex appliances or creating wrinkle effects on skin. 1 ounce size.
Please note that we cannot ship liquid latex items in the winter months, as freezing will damage them.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Cinema Secrets Liquid Latex will give 10 to 50 applications, depending on use You can apply dozens of prosthetics, or do 1-2 skin effects
